message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly less than what I had in mind.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
I appreciate your understanding, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,500?
